name: Shenick Network Systems
overview: Shenick Network Systems Limited provides per-flow Internet protocol (IP) communications test and performance monitoring systems that enable converged IP network service providers to test and monitor the service delivery life cycle from a laboratory to live deployment. The company offers diversifEye per flow converged IP network test systems that support security-enabled applications, such as voice over IP and secure Web emulation and analysis; and servicEye that offers an IPTV performance monitoring and service assurance solution. Its products address converged network and application performance issues for IPTV, VoD, triple play, IMS, security attack mitigation, deep packet inspection, traffic shaping, peer-to-peer, application server, metro Ethernet, and IPv4/IPv6 hybrid network deployments. The company provides its solutions to converged IP-oriented network service providers, communications equipment manufacturers, enterprises, and governments in the United States and internationally. It offers its products through direct sales channels, as well as through a network of indirect resellers. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Dun Laoghaire, Ireland with an additional office in Burlingame, California.

funding_rounds.source_description: Shenick announces $3.25 million strategic investment led by Innovacom
